content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace array at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (0, 0)) with coal as fuel and currently no ingredients to smelt.
- Furnace (position (2, 0)) with coal as fuel, currently no ingredients to smelt, and its result inventory is full with copper plates.

### Wooden chest at position(3.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position (3.5, 0.5)) containing 47 copper plates.

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to missing ingredients
- Ensure that you have the necessary crafting machines or furnaces set up to produce required sub-ingredients (e.g., copper plates and iron plates) before attempting to craft items that depend on them.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
